title: Classification using Pandas and Scikit-Learn
description:
This will be a tutorial-style talk demonstrating how to use pandas and
scikit-learn to do classification tasks. We will do some data munging
and visualization using pandas and matplotlib. Then we will introduce
some of the different classifiers in scikit-learn and show how to
include them into a classification pipeline to produce the best
predictive model. Interactive IPython/Jupyter notebooks will be
provided.
